Rage4 ANY - managed anycast BGP service

If you need route your customers to closest server and GeoDNS is not enough (even ours :)) the Rage4 ANY is perfect solution for you. Why? Because it's ...

1. Easy to setup

- download our client (or use old school GRE) and connect to our network,

- setup your routing software (like Quagga or ExaBGP) and establish BGP session with us (you can use private ASN which is free of charge),

- configure your service to use your anycast IP

That's all! Believe or not you can add up to 255 backend servers per single anycast IP

2. Secure - all IPs are DDoS protected in cooperation with Staminus

3. Cheap - the monthly cost of the service is 25€/IP with 25GB of traffic included (additional traffic 0.10€/GB). Additional discounts for multiple IPs and larger IP blocks.


If you have any questions feel free to drop us mail - office [ at ] gbshouse.com
